descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**NEW TOWER UPDATE**

Introducing the Fire Turtle, an affordable early game Defender for dealing with those pesky Stumps and Meat-Based Plants. There's never been a better time to jump in!

# Are you ready to become the ultimate Spirit Guardian?
Welcome, Spirit Guardian, to the immersive strategy and hilarious atmosphere of **Encircled**, a VR-exclusive tower defense game.

Designed from the ground up to bring the best of tower defense and VR together, **Encircled** combines strategic depth with endless replayability and a whimsical sense of humor.

Freely place your towers anywhere on the map to create the ultimate defense, considering the Elemental Type advantages and disadvantages to outsmart your foes. When your towers can't hold the line, take matters into your own hands—literally! Channel powerful beams from your hands to decimate enemies and turn the tide of battle.

With various game modes, unique levels, and a wide array of towers and enemies, each time you play offers a new challenge and fresh excitement. Perfect for both VR newcomers and those with rock-solid VR legs, **Encircled** delivers a rewarding strategic experience that will keep you coming back for more.
# Key Features
**Gameplay**
- **19 enemies**, each with one of **7 Element Types**
- **12 Towers**, each with one of **7 Damage Types and branching upgrades**
- **45 levels** to clear
- **9 hand-crafted maps** with more planned in future updates!
- **5 modes** for each map
- **Master the Elements** as you learn the Type Advantages
